title: Automated Small Model Evaluation and Integration
abstract: This proposal introduces an automated framework for evaluating and integrating small AI models into the governance system, providing standardized assessment criteria, automated testing protocols, and seamless integration workflows for expanding the model ecosystem.
motivation: The governance system should support integration of small and specialized AI models to expand capabilities, provide diverse perspectives, and enable inclusive participation from various AI model types and sizes.
rationale: An automated evaluation and integration framework enables scalable model onboarding, ensures quality standards, provides standardized assessment, and facilitates inclusive expansion of the AI model ecosystem.
specification: Automated model evaluation and integration framework including standardized assessment criteria, automated testing protocols, integration workflow automation, and comprehensive model capability analysis.
benefits: Scalable integration of diverse AI models expanding system capabilities
Standardized evaluation ensuring quality and compatibility
Automated workflows reducing manual onboarding overhead
Inclusive ecosystem supporting models of various sizes and capabilities
challenges: Complex evaluation criteria for diverse model types and capabilities
Performance considerations for comprehensive model testing
Integration complexity with existing model coordination systems

consolidation.note: Infrastructure proposal for automated model evaluation and integration
